Key Match Events: Harry Wilson scored a penalty to seal the victory
Montenegro nearly equalized with a shot hitting the woodwork
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy extended his unbeaten run as Wales boss to four games
Bellamy emphasized the importance of utilizing the squad to reach a major tournament
Post-Match Reflections: Bellamy expressed satisfaction with the team's performance and defensive shape
Without key players, Wales still managed a deserved victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales made seven changes from the previous match
Wilson scored his third consecutive goal for Wales
